Key Match Events: Barcola scored in the 1st minute for France
Dimarco scored in the 30th minute for Italy
Frattesi scored in the 51st minute for Italy
Retegui scored in the 49th minute for Italy
Raspadori scored in the 74th minute for Italy
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a 2-0 win for France
France and Italy are kicking off their new UEFA Nations League campaigns
France exited Euro 2024 in the semi-finals to Spain
Italy were eliminated in the last 16 of Euro 2024 by Switzerland
Luciano Spalletti has spoken of bringing clarity and consistency to the Italian setup
Italy has lost their last three friendly meetings with France but famously defeated them in the 2006 World Cup final
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Italy's first competitive meeting with France in 16 years
